did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.abstract: Advanced, uncorrected galley proof of the novel The Good Shepherdby C.S. Forester.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
Univeristy of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: C.S. Forester, The Good ShepherdGalley Proofs, 1955, Accession #11043, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This item was transferred from Rare Books, University of Virginia Library, to Special Collections, on August 28, 1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an advance, uncorrected galley proof of C.S. Forester's The Good Shepherd, 21 sheets, first published in condensed form in Life Magazinein its issues of March 14 and March 21, 1955, and published in book form by Little, Brown & Company shortly thereafter.
